name: Let Us Rise Together
description:
Designed for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Let Us Rise Together is a game about a disgruntled necromancer who raises Heroes from their graves to help him fight against his overbearing dungeon master.

Controls: WASD to Move, Left Mouse Click to perform actions

Approach the tombstones to raise up a Hero

Art by Jon Leung

Design & Programming by Tim Chan

Music by Benjamin Tissot from Bensound used Under Attribution License
